Package com.ibm.streams.management.security

Class Permissions

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.streams.management.security.Permissions
public class Permissions extends Object
Permissions contains access permissions a security principal has to a Streams secured object. Information about required permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

  • Constructor Details

    • Permissions

      @ConstructorProperties({"read","write","search","add","delete","own"}) public Permissions(boolean read, boolean write, boolean search, boolean add, boolean delete, boolean own)
      Constructs a Permissions object with indicators for each supported permission type.
      Parameters:
      read - identifies whether the principal has permission to retrieve object information.
      write - identifies whether the principal has permission to modify the object.
      search - identifies whether the principal has permission to list objects of the secured object type.
      add - identifies whether the principal has permission to create objects of the secured object type.
      delete - identifies whether the principal has permission to delete objects of the secured object type.
      own - identifies whether the principal has permission to change permissions to the object.

  • Method Details

    • getRead

      public boolean getRead()
      Indicates whether the principal has permission to retrieve object information.
      Returns:
      the read permission indicator.

    • getWrite

      public boolean getWrite()
      Indicates whether the principal has permission to modify the object.
      Returns:

      Indicates whether the principal has permission to list objects of the secured object type.
      Returns:
      the search permission indicator.

      public boolean getAdd()
      Indicates whether the principal has permission to create objects of the secured object type.
      Returns:

    • getDelete

      public boolean getDelete()
      Indicates whether the principal has permission to delete objects of the secured object type.
      Returns:
      the delete permission indicator.

    • getOwn

      public boolean getOwn()
      Indicates whether the principal has permission to change permissions to the object.
      Returns:
